meanings.definition: A type of weed that produces pollen causing allergies.
meanings.sent1: During summer, the ragweeds in the field make my nose stuffy.
meanings.sent2: My sister's sneezing is worse when the ragweeds bloom.
meanings.sent3: The ragweeds seem to be playing a prank on my allergies this year.
meanings.sent4: The ragweeds spread their pollen like tiny troublemakers in the garden.
meanings.sent5: I remember the ragweeds by the way they make me sneeze uncontrollably.
